data.title: Jill Hennessy Net Worth in 2024: Career, Income, and Quick Facts
data.meta_description: Discover Jill Hennessy net worth in 2024, career highlights, and quick facts. Written by Rachel for rachelparris.com, this article explores her financial journey.
data.text:
Jill Hennessy, known for her roles in Law & Order and Crossing Jordan, has built a notable career. Rachel explores Jill Hennessy net worth in 2024, her career milestones, and financial highlights in this comprehensive analysis.

Quick Facts

FACTDETAILReal NameJillian Noel HennessyPopular NameJill HennessyGenderFemaleBirth DateNovember 25, 1968Age55ParentsMaxine Hennessy, John HennessySiblingsJacqueline (twin sister), John Paul (brother)BirthplaceEdmonton, Alberta, CanadaNationalityCanadianEthnicityIrish, French, Swedish, Italian, Ukrainian Roma, AustrianEducationGrand River Collegiate InstituteMarital StatusMarriedSexual OrientationStraightHusband/SpousePaolo Mastropietro (m. 2000)ChildrenMaxine Hennessy, John HennessyDatingN/ANet Worth$12 millionSource of WealthActing, MusicHeight5 ft 8 in (173 cm)

What is the Net Worth Of Jill Hennessy in 2024?

As of 2024, Jill Hennessy’s net worth is estimated to be $12 million. Compared to other prominent figures in the entertainment industry, her financial success is notable. Here are some related personalities:

Gillian Anderson

Indigo Girls

For a broader perspective on wealth in the television industry, explore the top wealthiest TV celebrities.

What is the Salary/Income of Jill Hennessy in 2024?

Hennessy’s specific salary for 2024 has not been disclosed. However, her income is primarily derived from her roles in television series, films, and her music career.

Jill Hennessy Finance Overview

Career Highlights and Breakthrough Roles

Jill Hennessy‘s career began with a splash, making her mark with notable roles in television and film.

Her early career included roles in Law & Order as Claire Kincaid, where she garnered significant attention. This breakthrough paved the way for her leading role in Crossing Jordan, where she played Jordan Cavanaugh, a character that became iconic over the six-season run.

Her acting prowess in these roles not only earned her critical acclaim but also contributed significantly to her financial success.

Income from Television Roles

Television has been a major source of income for Hennessy. Her role in Law & Order laid the foundation for her financial stability, while her lead role in Crossing Jordan solidified her status and increased her earnings. These shows, popular among viewers, provided her with substantial and consistent income, contributing to her net worth.

Film Career Contributions

Hennessy’s film career, although secondary to her television work, has been impactful. She appeared in notable films such as Robocop 3 and Most Wanted, which added to her earnings.

Her work in independent films like Chutney Popcorn and The Acting Class, where she also took on writing and directing roles, further diversified her income streams.

Music Career and Album Sales

In addition to acting, she has pursued a successful music career. Her debut album Ghost in My Head, released in 2009, showcased her musical talents and contributed to her income.

Her second album I Do, released in 2015, continued to add to her financial portfolio. Performances and tours related to these albums also provided substantial revenue.

Endorsements and Commercials

Hennessy has also been involved in endorsement deals and commercials. Notably, she promoted Zaxby’s Zalads in television commercials, which added to her income. These endorsement deals, while not her primary income source, have provided additional financial support.

Other Sources of Income

Beyond her primary career in acting and music, Hennessy has explored other income avenues.

She performed on Broadway in Buddy: The Buddy Holly Story and engaged in writing, producing, and directing with projects like The Acting Class. These ventures have not only diversified her career but also contributed to her overall wealth.

Personal Life and Investments

Hennessy’s personal life, including her marriage to Paolo Mastropietro, has played a role in her financial journey. The couple, who have two sons, Marco and Gianni, have likely made investments that contribute to their financial stability.

While specific details on their investments are private, it is reasonable to assume that her earnings are managed and invested wisely.

Recognition and Awards

Recognition and awards have also played a role in Hennessy’s career. Her star on Canada’s Walk of Fame in 2007 is a testament to her impact and success in the entertainment industry. These accolades not only enhance her reputation but also open doors to more lucrative opportunities.

FAQs about Jill Hennessy

What is Hennessy’s real name?

Her real name is Jillian Noel Hennessy.

Where was Jill Hennessy born?

She was born in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada.

What are Hennessy’s notable TV roles?

She is best known for her roles in Law & Order and Crossing Jordan.

Has Hennessy released any music albums?

Yes, she has released two albums: Ghost in My Head (2009) and I Do (2015).

Is Jill Hennessy married?

Yes, she is married to Paolo Mastropietro.

Does Hennessy have children?

Yes, she has two sons, Marco and Gianni.

What are Hennessy’s primary sources of income?

Her primary sources of income are acting and music.

Has Hennessy received any awards?

Yes, she received a star on Canada’s Walk of Fame in 2007.

What is Hennessy’s nationality?

She is Canadian.
